content: Mark, I take inspiration from yourself, Brad Feld and Bryce Roberts. I’m transitioning from an entrepreneur to an investment role (investing in India within FinTech Core tech) and am scared shitless. With all the questions that come up with investing in budding founders, in my little experience, I believe what you are talking about goes a long way in determining a fit. Reading about your thoughts on investing is really awesome and weirdly comforting. Thank you :-)
